Text: Wow, you're fast tonight!  I can't tell you how much your devotion to bringing us Keith every night (and your lengthy, reasons verging on guilt when you can't) means to me.  You are simply The Best!
I agree with RexRoth's comment. Thank you for everything you do. You are terrific for posting these files so quickly. Absolutely terrific.

Thanks for all the comments, folks!

I'm glad you're finding these choppy-video files to be watchable. There's a balance between (1) quality level and (2) time of posting, and since I consider Countdown to be pretty "newsy," my priority is with (2). But I'll always strive to get the best (1) I can, withing the constraints of (2).
